ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: for you and your livestock to enjoy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: A provision for you and your cattle.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: all this as a provision for you and your cattle.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (These are made so as to be) means of enjoyment for you and your cattle.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: In order to benefit you and your cattle.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: A provision and benefit for you and your cattle.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: A provision for you and for your cattle.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: an enjoyment for you and your flocks.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Provision for you and your cattle.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: as provision for you and for your cattle to enjoy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: A provision for you and for your cattle.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: as a sustenance for you and your livestock.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: For use and convenience to you and your cattle.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (To be) a provision and benefit for you and your cattle.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: for you and for your herds to delight in.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Enjoyment for you, and for your livestock.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [As] enjoyment for you and your grazing livestock.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [80:32] as sustenance (understand matā‘an as mut‘atan or tamtī‘an, as explained above in the previous sūra) for you and your flocks (also as [explained] above).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Provision for you) the grains are of benefit to you (and your cattle) and fodder is of benefit to your cattle.
